### 9.1 Tidying data

In the last session, you learned how to use `gather()` and `spread()` to tidy the layout of your data. In this session, you will learn how to separate or combine cells using `separate()` and `unite()`.

**Go through the RStudio Primer 4.2 [Separate and Unite Columns](https://rstudio.cloud/learn/primers/4.2).**
